Text: Don't work on Leopard for me.....
Sorry don't work on Lion for me...ignore first post.
Don't work on Lion foe me....

Installed just fine on Snow Leopard (10.6.8)
A few glitches, however.
I could only get the sound to function with Logic open. Not running it through Logic, just had Logic open.Weird.
It also didn't detect my M-Audio USB keyboard.
FL Studio on a PC doesn't have a problem (and "yes" I know all about setting midi preferences).
As far as there being no FL Studio on the Mac- they did do some Mac beta testing with FL Studio 9  so I assume this is where this came from.
There are other issues such as the text being nearly unreadable in the various preference windows- the drop down menus are clear however.
All of this begs the question of why anyone would waste their time with a hack program like Fruity Loops anyway? The convoluted recording path is irritating and the instruments and sounds they produce are worse than children's toys.
(Why do I bother? It's my job to know these things so I have to go through all of this.)
For me- this is a curiosity and nothing more.
FL Studio, whether on it's native PC or ported to the Mac environment, is still dreadful.
Happy New Year to all at TPB!
this works in mountain lion or just snow leopard
